verses.verse: But of the times <S%G5550><s%> and the seasons, <S%G2540><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> that I write <S%G1125><s%> to you.

For yourselves <S%G846><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> perfectly <S%G199><s%> that the day <S%G2250><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> as a thief <S%G2812><s%> in the night. <S%G3571><s%>

For when <S%G3752><s%> they shall say, <S%G3004><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> and safety; <S%G803><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> sudden <S%G160><s%> destruction <S%G3639><s%> comes <S%G2186><s%> on them, as travail <S%G5604><s%> on a woman with child; <S%G1722><s%> <S%G106><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and they shall not <S%G1628><s%>escape.
But you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> are not in darkness, <S%G4655><s%> that that day <S%G2250><s%> should overtake <S%G2638><s%> you as a thief. <S%G2812><s%>

You are all <S%G3956><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of light, <S%G5457><s%> and the children <S%G5207><s%> of the day: <S%G2250><s%> we are not of the night, <S%G3571><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of darkness. <S%G4655><s%>
Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> let us not sleep, <S%G2518><s%> as do others; <S%G3062><s%> but let us watch <S%G1127><s%> and be sober. <S%G3525><s%>
For they that sleep <S%G2518><s%> sleep <S%G2518><s%> in the night; <S%G3571><s%> and they that be drunken <S%G3184><s%> are drunken <S%G3184><s%> in the night. <S%G3571><s%>

But let us, who are of the day, <S%G2250><s%> be sober, <S%G3525><s%> putting <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> the breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> and love; <S%G26><s%> and for an helmet, <S%G4030><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of salvation. <S%G4991><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> has not appointed <S%G5087><s%> us to wrath, <S%G3709><s%> but to obtain <S%G4047><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> by our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
Who <S%G3588><s%> died <S%G599><s%> for us, that, whether <S%G1535><s%> we wake <S%G1127><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> sleep, <S%G2518><s%> we should live <S%G2198><s%> together <S%G260><s%> with him.

Why <S%G1352><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> yourselves <S%G240><s%> together, <S%G240><s%> and edify <S%G3618><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> another, <S%G1520><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as also <S%G2532><s%> you do. <S%G4160><s%>

And we beseech <S%G2065><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> to know <S%G1492><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, and are over <S%G4291><s%> you in the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and admonish <S%G3560><s%> you;

And to esteem <S%G2233><s%> them very <S%G5228><s%> highly <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> in love <S%G26><s%> for their work's <S%G2041><s%> sake. And be at <S%G1722><s%> peace <S%G1518><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves. <S%G1438><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we exhort <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> warn <S%G3560><s%> them that are unruly, <S%G813><s%> comfort <S%G3888><s%> the feebleminded, <S%G3642><s%> support <S%G472><s%> the weak, <S%G772><s%> be patient <S%G3114><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men.

See <S%G3708><s%> that none <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> render <S%G591><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> for evil <S%G2556><s%> to any <S%G5100><s%> man; but ever <S%G3842><s%> follow <S%G1377><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> men.
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> ever more. <S%G3842><s%>
Pray <S%G4336><s%> without <S%G89><s%> ceasing. <S%G89><s%>
In every <S%G3956><s%> thing give thanks: <S%G2168><s%> for this <S%G5124><s%> is the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> concerning <S%G1519><s%> you.
Quench <S%G4570><s%> not the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Despise <S%G1848><s%> not prophesyings. <S%G4394><s%>
Prove <S%G1381><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; hold <S%G2722><s%> fast <S%G2722><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is good. <S%G2570><s%>
Abstain <S%G567><s%> from all <S%G3956><s%> appearance <S%G1491><s%> of evil. <S%G4190><s%>

And the very <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> sanctify <S%G37><s%> you wholly; <S%G3651><s%> and I pray God your <S%G3588><s%> whole <S%G3648><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> and soul <S%G5590><s%> and body <S%G4983><s%> be preserved <S%G5083><s%> blameless <S%G274><s%> to the coming <S%G3952><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is he that calls <S%G2564><s%> you, who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> will do <S%G4160><s%> it.
Brothers, <S%G80><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> for us.
Greet <S%G782><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> with an holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%>
I charge <S%G3726><s%> you by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that this <S%G3588><s%> letter <S%G1992><s%> be read <S%G314><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you. Amen. <S%G281><s%> The first epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
